attributes.action: Deport home immigrants who are criminals (rapists, murderers, paedophiles, burglars) or have no skills which will benfit the UK economy
attributes.additional_details: High skilled immigration is essential for a strong economy but why must we let in those who are criminals, murderers, rapists, paedophiles and those who are unskilled and only a drain on the generous benefit system the uk has to offer. Why not deport this type of immigrnt back to their home country where they can be looked after there were they may truly have something to complain about in terms of living conditions and government handouts which they seem so adamant in complaining about in the UK. Lets close the UK borders on unskilled immigration and only let in those who are willing to work for a living like the rest of the UK public.
